course_title: Novel Psychotherapeutics: Contemporary Practice Across the Lifespan
course_description: Students will examine the emerging evidence to apply psychotherapeutic methods for prevention and maintenance of psychiatric conditions. Application of principles from the fields of advanced psychopharmacotherapy, genetics, genomics, alternative therapeutics will be examined.
prerequisites: NRSG 839D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
